com.google.android.exoplayer

Class SampleSourceTrackRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.TrackRenderer
      • com.google.android.exoplayer.SampleSourceTrackRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExoPlayer.ExoPlayerComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Eia608TrackRenderer, MediaCodecTrackRenderer, MetadataTrackRenderer, TextTrackRenderer

    public abstract class SampleSourceTrackRenderer
extends TrackRenderer
    Base class for TrackRenderer implementations that render samples obtained from a SampleSource.

    • Method Detail

      • doPrepare

        protected final boolean doPrepare(long positionUs)
                           throws ExoPlaybackException
        Description copied from class: TrackRenderer
        Invoked to make progress when the renderer is in the TrackRenderer.STATE_UNPREPARED state. This method will be called repeatedly until true is returned.

        This method should return quickly, and should not block if the renderer is currently unable to make any useful progress.

        Specified by:
        doPrepare in class TrackRenderer
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The player's current playback position.
        Returns:
        True if the renderer is now prepared. False otherwise.
        Throws:
        ExoPlaybackException - If an error occurs.

      • onEnabled

        protected void onEnabled(int track,
             long positionUs,
             boolean joining)
                  throws ExoPlaybackException
        Description copied from class: TrackRenderer
        Called when the renderer is enabled.

        The default implementation is a no-op.

        Overrides:
        onEnabled in class TrackRenderer
        Parameters:
        track - The track for which the renderer is being enabled.
        positionUs - The player's current position.
        joining - Whether this renderer is being enabled to join an ongoing playback.
        Throws:
        ExoPlaybackException - If an error occurs.

      • seekTo

        protected final void seekTo(long positionUs)
                     throws ExoPlaybackException
        Description copied from class: TrackRenderer
        Seeks to a specified time in the track.

        This method may be called when the renderer is in the following states: TrackRenderer.STATE_ENABLED

        Specified by:
        seekTo in class TrackRenderer
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The desired playback position in microseconds.
        Throws:
        ExoPlaybackException - If an error occurs.

      • doSomeWork

        protected final void doSomeWork(long positionUs,
              long elapsedRealtimeUs)
                         throws ExoPlaybackException
        Description copied from class: TrackRenderer
        Invoked to make progress when the renderer is in the TrackRenderer.STATE_ENABLED or TrackRenderer.STATE_STARTED states.

        If the renderer's state is TrackRenderer.STATE_STARTED, then repeated calls to this method should cause the media track to be rendered. If the state is TrackRenderer.STATE_ENABLED, then repeated calls should make progress towards getting the renderer into a position where it is ready to render the track.

        This method should return quickly, and should not block if the renderer is currently unable to make any useful progress.

        This method may be called when the renderer is in the following states: TrackRenderer.STATE_ENABLED, TrackRenderer.STATE_STARTED

        Specified by:
        doSomeWork in class TrackRenderer
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The current media time in microseconds, measured at the start of the current iteration of the rendering loop.
        elapsedRealtimeUs - SystemClock.elapsedRealtime() in microseconds, measured at the start of the current iteration of the rendering loop.
        Throws:
        ExoPlaybackException - If an error occurs.

      • getBufferedPositionUs

        protected long getBufferedPositionUs()
        Description copied from class: TrackRenderer
        Returns an estimate of the absolute position in microseconds up to which data is buffered.

        This method may be called when the renderer is in the following states: TrackRenderer.STATE_ENABLED, TrackRenderer.STATE_STARTED

        Specified by:
        getBufferedPositionUs in class TrackRenderer
        Returns:
        An estimate of the absolute position in microseconds up to which data is buffered, or TrackRenderer.END_OF_TRACK_US if the track is fully buffered, or TrackRenderer.UNKNOWN_TIME_US if no estimate is available.

      • getDurationUs

        protected long getDurationUs()
        Description copied from class: TrackRenderer
        Returns the duration of the media being rendered.

        This method may be called when the renderer is in the following states: TrackRenderer.STATE_PREPARED, TrackRenderer.STATE_ENABLED, TrackRenderer.STATE_STARTED

        Specified by:
        getDurationUs in class TrackRenderer
        Returns:
        The duration of the track in microseconds, or TrackRenderer.MATCH_LONGEST_US if the track's duration should match that of the longest track whose duration is known, or or TrackRenderer.UNKNOWN_TIME_US if the duration is not known.

      • shiftInputPosition

        protected long shiftInputPosition(long positionUs)
        Shifts positions passed to onEnabled(int, long, boolean), seekTo(long) and doSomeWork(long, long).

        The default implementation does not modify the position. Except in very specific cases, subclasses should not override this method.

        Parameters:
        positionUs - The position in microseconds.
        Returns:
        The adjusted position in microseconds.

      • readSource

        protected final int readSource(long positionUs,
             MediaFormatHolder formatHolder,
             SampleHolder sampleHolder)
        Reads from the enabled upstream source.
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The current playback position.
        formatHolder - A MediaFormatHolder object to populate in the case of a new format.
        sampleHolder - A SampleHolder object to populate in the case of a new sample. If the caller requires the sample data then it must ensure that SampleHolder.data references a valid output buffer.
        Returns:
        The result, which can be SampleSource.SAMPLE_READ, SampleSource.FORMAT_READ, SampleSource.NOTHING_READ or SampleSource.END_OF_STREAM.

      • handlesTrack

        protected abstract boolean handlesTrack(MediaFormat mediaFormat)
                                 throws MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException
        Returns whether this renderer is capable of handling the provided track.
        Parameters:
        mediaFormat - The format of the track.
        Returns:
        True if the renderer can handle the track, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        MediaCodecUtil.DecoderQueryException - Thrown if there was an error querying decoders.

      • onDiscontinuity

        protected abstract void onDiscontinuity(long positionUs)
                                 throws ExoPlaybackException
        Invoked when a discontinuity is encountered. Also invoked when the renderer is enabled, for convenience.
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The playback position after the discontinuity, or the position at which the renderer is being enabled.
        Throws:
        ExoPlaybackException - If an error occurs handling the discontinuity.

      • doSomeWork

        protected abstract void doSomeWork(long positionUs,
              long elapsedRealtimeUs,
              boolean sourceIsReady)
                            throws ExoPlaybackException
        Called by doSomeWork(long, long).
        Parameters:
        positionUs - The current media time in microseconds, measured at the start of the current iteration of the rendering loop.
        elapsedRealtimeUs - SystemClock.elapsedRealtime() in microseconds, measured at the start of the current iteration of the rendering loop.
        sourceIsReady - The result of the most recent call to SampleSource.SampleSourceReader.continueBuffering(int, long).
        Throws:
        ExoPlaybackException - If an error occurs.
        ExoPlaybackException
